I'm not sure if I'm a good cook, but my dog seems to like my cooking.
i love to snack between meals.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in an orphanage, as my parents died when I was young.
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm curious what they'd have to say about my life as a tiger.
I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance.
I am a great listener and I always have my kids' backs.
I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How are you?
I'm doing well too. I'm adjusting to college life and still trying to find my way around.
That's great to hear. College is a great experience. I'm sure you'll adjust quickly.
Thanks, I hope so. I'm looking for a place to live that is close to the Y so I can continue my swimming routine.
That's a great idea. I love swimming. I used to swim competitively when I was younger.
Oh, that's cool. I'm not sure if I'm a good cook, but my dog seems to like my cooking.
That's all that matters. As long as your dog likes it, then you're a good cook.
Thanks, I appreciate that. I love to go to comedy clubs. They always make me laugh.
Me too. I love laughing. It's the best medicine.
I'm glad to hear that. I'm still trying to find my way around college, but I'm sure I'll adjust quickly.
You've got this. I'm sure you'll do great.
